select SUM(prices) as prices, DATE_FORMAT( createTime, "%Y-%m-%d" ) as `time` from orders
and id in (select oid from orders_sub where cid in (select id from commodity where sid = (select id from store where userid = #{userId})))
group by DATE_FORMAT( createTime, "%Y-%m-%d" ) order by DATE_FORMAT( createTime, "%Y-%m-%d" ) desc limit 0,7
